column4: has anyone here ever had abiword crash on them?  I have a .SAVED file now, but I don't know what to do with it
Help! I was writing a term paper and abiword crashed, now I have a .SAVED file, has anyone seen this?
opne abiword and from the file menu select open an open the .saved file , see if your work is still there
Yeah I tried to open it with abiword, but it's apparently a latex file
